short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you click on an email link, the addresses is automatically copied to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instead of opening Outlook or Mail.app by default, this extension copies all email addresses within an email (mailto) link directly to your clipboard when clicked.

- Copies directly to your clipboard.
- Ignores bcc, subject, etc.
- You can choose to show a notification when the address is copied successfully.
- Light and dark mode support.
